Rachel Weisz bo Elizabeth Taylor
Prihaja nova biografska drama o hollywoodski legendi. V ospredju bodo njena humanitarna prizadevanja.
04 Nov 2019, 17:17 by E. B.



Oskarjevka se veseli nove vloge. FOTOGRAFIJI: Reuters



Radi pozabljamo, da je bila velika humanitarka.


Biografske drame so v zadnjem času izjemno priljubljene in dobičkonosne, javnost preprosto vedno zanima zasebno življenje zvezdnikov filmske in glasbene industrije, zato je bil verjetno že skrajni čas, da se filmarji lotijo nove upodobitve življenja hollywoodske ikone in velike aktivistke Elizabeth Taylor.


Radi pozabljamo, da je bila velika humanitarka.

Zvezdnica, ki je slovela tako po svojih izjemnih vlogah kakor tudi po številnih burnih razmerjih in osmih zakonih, razkošnem modnem slogu in ljubezni do nakita, je bila velika borka za pravice prikrajšanih in bolnih posameznikov, kar pa svet, obseden z materialnimi dosežki in kopičenjem premoženja, vse prerad pozablja. 
Neutrudna aktivistka
Zato je nujno, da se Taylorjevi poklonimo v sveži biografski drami, kjer bo v ospredju prav njen nenehni boj za pravičnost, ki ga je sama postavljala daleč pred karierne uspehe. Film, ki nosi naslov A Special Relationship, se bo tako osredotočil na igralkino pot do slave in njeno vztrajno predanost dobrodelnim dejavnostim, predvsem tistim, ki so se bojevale proti aidsu, Taylorjevo pa bo najbolje upodobila Rachel Weisz, so sklenili ustvarjalci.
8zakonov je okusila zvezdnica.
Zvezdnica, ki si je z vlogo v Zvestem vrtnarju prislužila laskavega oskarja pa tudi številne druge nagrade tako za filmske kot gledališke dosežke, bo nedvomno odlično utelesila strast, eleganco, nadarjenost in dobroto, s katerimi se je ponašala legenda, ustvarjalci pa so pojasnili, da bo film znova potrdil, kako sta poštenje in prijateljstvo ključna za boljši in lepši svet, za kakršnega si je neutrudno prizadevala prav Elizabeth Taylor.
Rachel Weisz bo utelesila strast in eleganco legende.
Weiszova, žena Daniela Craiga, je nadvse počaščena, da se bo lahko prelevila v hollywoodsko ikono, kot producenta pa se bosta izkazala Ian Canning in Emily Sherman, ki sta se podpisala tudi pod odlični Kraljev govor. Scenarist bo avtor Revnega milijonarja Simon Beaufoy, režija pa v rokah ženskega dua Bert&Bertie.

Rachel Weisz will be Elizabeth Taylor
A new biographical drama about a Hollywood legend is coming. Her humanitarian efforts will be at the forefront.
04 Nov 2019, 17:17 by E. B.



Oscar is looking forward to a new role. PHOTOS: Reuters



We like to forget that she was a great humanitarian.


Biographical dramas have been hugely popular and profitable lately, with the public simply always interested in the personal lives of movie and music industry stars, so it may be high time for filmmakers to embark on a new depiction of the life of Hollywood icon and great activist Elizabeth Taylor.


We like to forget that she was a great humanitarian.

A celebrity known for her remarkable roles as well as her tumultuous relationships and eight laws, luxurious fashion and her love for jewelry, she was a great fighter for the rights of disadvantaged and sick individuals, a world obsessed with material achievements and wealth accumulation. , he forgets all the processing.
A tireless activist
It is therefore imperative that we pay tribute to Taylor's fresh biographical drama, which will be at the forefront of her constant struggle for justice, which has set her well ahead of her career successes. A Special Relationship movie will focus on the actress' journey to fame and her continued dedication to charity, especially those who have fought AIDS, and Taylor will be best portrayed by Rachel Weisz, the makers have concluded.
The 8 laws were flavored by the superstar.
The star, who earned a flattering Oscar for her role in The Horticulturist, as well as numerous other awards for film and theater achievements, will no doubt perfectly embody the passion, elegance, talent and goodness that the legend boasted, and the creators explained that the film will reaffirm that honesty and friendship are key to a better and more beautiful world, as Elizabeth Taylor has worked tirelessly for.
Rachel Weisz will embody the passion and elegance of a legend.
Weisz, the wife of Daniel Craig, is extremely honored to be transformed into a Hollywood icon and will be produced by Ian Canning and Emily Sherman, who have also signed under King's excellent speech.
